MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-NOV-2020 04:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH65 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Whitby Road, Cambridge Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have restored supplies to a number of properties and are working on repairs to the underground cable fault in the area and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:49am on 7th November
